title: The Highest Wall
description: Templin tries to get the story of a beautiful teenager, the heir to a fortune, who is imprisoned in a walled villa.

title: Journey Into Darkness
description: A beautiful widow who is being blackmailed is shot, but refuses to tell the police who her assailant was. Ben Gregory is determined to get the woman's story.

title: The Woman Who Never Was
description: Templin is accused of killing a foreign currency dealer.

title: Busman's Holiday
description: Eric Jason recognizes a mob hitman on the beach cavorting with a blonde bombshell.

title: Another Part of the Triangle
description: Templin follows the widow of a famous writer who was said to have been lost at sea in order to investigate a rumor that the man might be alive and still writing under a nom de plume.

title: The Longest Crap Game in History
description: A former marine returns to Hawaii to retrieve the pot of a craps game that was interrupted by the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor twenty years before.

title: The Hunters
description: Gregory joins a safari and finds himself targeted for death.

title: Little Girl Lost
description: Jason investigates a young girl's claim that she suffers from amnesia after rescuing her from drowning.

title: Night Song
description: Templin investigates the story of a beautiful singer who will no longer perform out of fear of her former manager.

title: Mele Kalikimaka to You
description: Gregory and Templin throw a Christmas party for the meanest man on Oahu.

title: Conspiracy of Silence
description: Templin is asked to collaborate on a former movie star's autobiography, but the woman refuses to explain why hasn't appeared in front of the camera in recent years.

title: The Far Side of Nowhere
description: Jason, hired to write the story of the Randolph family, an iron-fisted clan who have ruled a small Hawaiian island as a personal fiefdom, winds up investigating a murder on their idyllic cay.

title: The Last of the Big Spenders
description: A beachcomber reveals to Templin his past as the former mayor of a major American city and tells the reporter he fears for his life.

title: The Girl from Brandenberg
description: A German girl tries to retrieve counterfeit money planted on Eric Jason without the reporter knowing.

title: Chicago Style
description: Eric Jason discovers Pinky Hamilton, a famous jazz pianist, is living in Hawaii under an assumed name and plans to write a story about his career. Pinky isn't happy about being discovered since the gangster who tried to kill him 30 years earlier still wants to settle accounts.

title: The Primitive Clay
description: Several illustrations for one of Gregory's articles earn the artist some unexpected notoriety - two pretty girls show up on his doorstep claiming to be his long-lost daughter.

title: Ghost Story
description: Ben Gregory discovers his tape recorder running in his penthouse. When he replays the tape, he hears the voice of a man thought dead for many years and who is willing to tell his story, but only for a hefty fee.

title: Sergeant Kolchak Fades Away
description: Templin tries to develop a story based on an ex-Marine's storied career, but the former leatherneck won't cooperate.

title: The Dumbest Blonde
description: Ben Gregory is working on a story of a oil tycoon who is trying to cook up a big deal with a crooked financier. The story and the deal may fall apart because of the ditsy mistress' innocent interference.

title: Annie Beeler's Place
description: A ex-crook now tending bar in his girlfriend's saloon is forced by his former underworld associates to join them in a bank heist.

title: The Irresistible Miss Bullfinch
description: The reporters help a woman find her former boyfriend who had long ago been run off by her father as an unsuitable match for his daughter.

title: A Choice of Weapons
description: An up-and-coming professional boxer chucks his career in the ring in order to become a college student, much to his manager's annoyance.

title: Marine of the Month
description: Eric Jason is assigned to cover a U.S. Marine Corps sergeant, who also turns out to be a gorgeous redhead with a wonderful figure.

title: The Inhuman Equation
description: Ben considers his current assignment - writing about a new computer - extremely boring, until a nerdy accountant discovers that the machine made a mistake in its calculations.

title: A Ghost in Her Gazebo
description: A widow, now the head of a huge business, is urged to sell the company by her children. She decides to consult a medium in order to seek business advice from her late husband.

title: Not Aunt Charlotte!
description: Eighteen-year-old Penny Baxter is excited about visiting Hawaii until she discovers her maiden aunt will travel with her as a chaperone. It's the older woman, however, who finds romance in the islands when she meets a handsome beachcomber.

title: Run, Clown, Run
description: Gregory and Jason investigate when they learn a beloved circus clown has a profitable sideline playing the stock market and may also have a criminal past.

title: Chalk One Up for Johnny
description: Gentleman Johnny Pace, once a famous mayor of a major American city, decides to move to Kauai and open a hotel with his wife.
